source_sentence: 佛說一切如來真實攝大乘現證
translation: Buddha's teaching that all tathāgatas are truly included in the manifestation of the great vehicle

source_sentence: 三昧大教王經卷第十七
translation: Samādhi-dajiaowang jing, vol. 17

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大夫試光祿卿
translation: Minister of Light for the Tripiṭaka Translation of the Sutra of the Western Paradise, the Grand Master of the Chaofeng

source_sentence: 傳法大師賜紫沙門臣施護等
translation: The Great Master Dharma transmitter bestowed the purple monk minister Shihu and others
translation of the imperial edict

source_sentence: 一切金剛部法三昧曼拏羅廣大儀軌分第十三爾時世尊。
translation: Yiqie jingangbu fazhanmei mannaluo guanggui fenbie jieyi The Bhagavān then entered the samādhi of all the Tathāgatas' teachings again, producing the vajra-supporting concentration.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來法三昧出生金剛加持三摩地。
translation: Again, he entered the samādhi of all the tathāgatas' teachings and produced the vajra-supporting absorption.
He spoke this supreme great teaching of his own school, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)尾咄(半音一句)爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) vajra-rāja (biphasic) vidyā (a half-sound phrase), then the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.
He spoke this great teaching of the concentration of one's own dharma, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)唱那唱那吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)爾時金剛藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) sarga na sarga na un (citation needed) kha (a half-sound phrase), then Vajragarbha Bodhisattva Mahāsa.
He spoke this great teaching of the concentration of one's own mind, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)喝囉喝囉吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)爾時金剛眼菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) dhāraṇa dhāraṇa un (citation needed) Ṛṣṭrapāla (a half-sound phrase)," said the Vajrajñāna Bodhisattva Mahāsa.
He spoke this great teaching on the concentration of one's own mind, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)摩囉摩囉吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)爾時金剛巧業菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) mālā mālā un (citation needed) Ṛṣṭrapāla (half-sound phrase), then the Vajrajñāna-eyed Bodhisattva Mahāsa declared this self-function samādhi great luminosity.
He spoke this great teaching of the concentration of one's own mind, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)酤嚕酤嚕吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)爾時金剛最上明菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) rululu rululu un (citation needed) ṭṭa (a half-sound phrase) was the time when Vajragarbha Bodhisattva Mahāsa Saṃbhava explained this great teaching of self-functional concentration.
He spoke this great teaching of the concentration of one's own mind, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)吽(引)吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)摩邪金剛等四金剛明王大明曰。
translation: "Om (citation needed) Un (citation needed) Un (citation needed) Neṭa (half-sounding phrase), the four vajra-ruler mahāsattvas, including Mañjuśrī, said.

source_sentence: 唵(引)親那親那吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)阿(引)尾舍(引)尾舍吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)部(引)哩部(二合)嚩莎吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)親那親那吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)四金剛忿怒王大明曰。
translation: "Om (citation) Oṇa Oṇa Un (citation) Neṭṭha (half-sounding phrase) Om (citation) A (citation) Vaiśravaṇa (citation) Vaiśravaṇa Un (citation) Neṭṭha (half-sounding phrase) Om (citation) Bhojpuri (citation) Bhojpuri (two-way) Vāsa Un (citation) Neṭṭha (half-sounding phrase) Om (citation) Oṇa Oṇa Un (citation) Neṭṭha (half-sounding phrase) The great luminous knowledge of the four vajra wrathful kings said.

source_sentence: 唵(引)捺摩捺摩吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)摩(引)囉野摩(引)囉野吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)伽(引)多野伽(引)多野吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)婆野婆野吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)四金剛大魔主大明曰。
translation: Om (citation) nama nama un (citation) ṭṭa (one half-sound phrase) Om (citation) mo (citation) rono mo (citation) rono un (citation) ṭṭa (one half-sound phrase) Om (citation) ga (citation) tano ga (citation) tano un (citation) ṭa (one half-sound phrase) Om (citation) bano bano un (citation) ṭṭa (one half-sound phrase) The great lord of the four vajra māras, the great lord of the māras, said in his great luminosity.

source_sentence: 唵(引)摩捺摩捺吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)滿馱滿馱吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)嚩尸(引)婆嚩吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)惹野惹野吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)四金剛使者大明曰。
translation: "Om (citation needed) māṇḍamāṇḍa un (citation needed) ṭṭā (half-sounding phrase) Om (citation needed) māṇḍamāṇḍa un (citation needed) ṭā (half-sounding phrase) Om (citation needed) vāsi (citation needed) vāsi un (citation needed) ṭā (half-sounding phrase) Om (citation needed) jayo jayo un (citation needed) ṭā (half-sounding phrase) The great luminosity of the four vajra messengers said.

source_sentence: 唵(引)毘踰(二合引)毘踰(二合引)吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)蛩蛩吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)入嚩(二合)羅入嚩(二合)羅吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)珂(引)那珂(引)那吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)四金剛僕使大明曰。
translation: "Om (citation) vyū (dichotomy) vyū (dichotomy) un (citation) ṭṭa (half a phrase) Om (citation) cricket un (citation) ṭa (half a phrase) Om (citation) enter va (dichotomy) la enter va (dichotomy) la un (citation) ṭa (half a phrase) Om (citation) ke (citation) naka (citation) naka (citation) un (citation) ṭa (half a phrase) The great luminosity of the four vajra servants said.

source_sentence: 唵(引)唱那唱那吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)摩(引)囉摩(引)囉吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)屹哩(二合)恨拏(二合)屹哩(二合)恨拏(二合)吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)唵(引)必嚩必嚩吽(引)癹吒(半音一句)爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation) sing na sing na un (citation) ṭṭa (half-word) Om (citation) mo (citation) lo mo (citation) lo un (citation) ṭṭa (half-word) Om (citation) yi li (duo) hate na (duo) yi li (duo) hate na (duo) un (citation) ṭṭa (half-word) Om (citation) bhi ve (bhi ve) un (citation) ṭṭa (half-word) At that point, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsa.

source_sentence: 說此一切金剛部法三昧曼拏羅頌曰。
translation: He spoke this verse of the samādhi maṇḍala of all the vajra group's teachings, saying.

source_sentence: 我今次第當演說　　大法三昧曼拏羅　其相猶如三世輪　　此曼拏羅如是畫　是中一切依次第　　佛及執金剛等尊　依彼法曼拏羅儀　　以心標幟普遍畫此法三昧曼拏羅中。
translation: "Now, I will explain in sequence the great samādhi maṇḍala of the Dharma, whose characteristics are like the wheels of the three worlds. This maṇḍala is drawn like this, in which everything is done in sequence, by the Buddha and the vajras who hold the vajra according to the rituals of this dharma maṇḍala and who universally draw this samādhi maṇḍala of the Dharma with a mental marker.
After they did so according to the teaching and according to the rules, the Vajrajari taught them.
That vajra-rāja priest.

source_sentence: 以金剛鈴同結金剛持印。
translation: He used the vajra bell to make the vajra-charging seal together.
According to the teaching, he led his disciple into the maṇḍala.
He said to the disciple.

source_sentence: 若有不入此三昧中不知此部法者。
translation: "Suppose there's someone who doesn't enter this samādhi and doesn't know this part of the teaching.
Don't readily explain this teaching for them.
After giving him the vow and admonition, he then rang a bell.
You must then ring the bell.
Again, he gave them this verse of vowing his mind, saying.

source_sentence: 隨此振鈴大智聲　　所作如應皆決定　而此羯磨金剛杵　　所應破壞亦決定　若不尊敬阿闍梨　　金剛助伴為非友　惡者返向以慈心　　此作是為輪迴道說是頌已。
translation: "Following this great wisdom sound of ringing a bell, whatever is done will be determined as it should be, and this karma vajra will also determine what should be destroyed. If someone doesn't honor the Ajātaśatru, the vajra's assistant will be a bad friend, and that bad person will return with kindness. This is the way to follow the path of transmigration." After speaking this verse, he removed his face and cloth for the disciple and explained the teaching.
He then removed his disciple's face and silk.
Next, he'll show the Dharma samādhi seal of wisdom.

source_sentence: 佛及執金剛等尊　　如法曼拏羅所說　一切有情寂靜因　　此即金剛最上明　若此世間如幻化　　苦如鈴聲亦復然　寂靜一切諸苦因　　金剛器仗此無上　調伏有情勝忿怒　　彼善妙光決定破　擊害無勝金剛杖　　警怖一切邪見者　冤敵無勝於驕倨　　繫縛無勝金剛鬘　世間敬愛所欲人　　破冤無勝勝魔主　善破無勝勝調者　　周遍隨轉金剛風　最勝大光火金剛　　受用無勝勝貪者　大牙清淨能警召　　一切死者能還命　怖畏無勝尾覲那　　諸飲味中無勝水一切金剛部羯磨曼拏羅廣大儀軌分第十四爾時世尊。
translation: If this world is illusory and painful, like the sound of a bell, so too is this unsurpassed vajra weapon that quells all causes of suffering and subdues the anger of sentient beings, that good, wonderful light resolutely refutes it, strikes harm with the unsurpassed vajra staff, alarms all those who hold wrong views, has no enemy greater than pride, binds the unsurpassed vajra garland, honors those whom the world loves, destroys wrongs with the unsurpassed demon lord, skillfully refutes the unsurpassed tamer, circulates the vajra wind, has the greatest great light, fire, and vajra, has enjoyment with the unsurpassed greed, has clean teeth, alerts all the dead, returns life, is feared with the unsurpassed Vikina, has no water greater than the taste of drink, and has the vast rituals of the Vajra group's kalpa maṇḍala.

source_sentence: 復入一切如來羯磨三昧出生金剛加持三摩地。
translation: He then again entered the samādhi of the karma of all tathāgatas and produced the vajra-supporting absorption.
He spoke this supreme great teaching of his own school, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)葛哩摩(二合)鉢囉(二合)嚩哩帝(二合引)儞三摩曳(引)吽(引一句)爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) vajra-rāja (btn) grima (btn) prabhāra (btn) vajra-ti (btn) nip samādhi (citation needed) un (citation needed) At that point, the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.
He spoke his own karma, the supreme great teaching, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)尾邏(引)西(引)布(引)惹野吽(引一句)爾時金剛藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) vajrajirā (binary) waila (citation needed) sah (citation needed) pu (citation needed) jaya (citation needed) mahāsattva, the Vajragarbha Bodhisattva, at that time.
He spoke his own karma, the supreme great teaching, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合引)毘尸(引)枳(引)毘詵左吽(引一句)爾時金剛眼菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om(citation needed) vajrajirā(citation needed) viśe(citation needed) Ṛṣantaza un(citation needed).
He spoke the supreme great teaching of his own karma, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)詣(引)帝(引)誐(引)呬吽(引一句)爾時金剛巧業菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om(citation needed) vajra(citation needed) ti(citation needed) mo(citation needed) freh(citation needed), then the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva of Adamantine Skillful Actions spoke from his own karma, the supreme great teaching.
He spoke his own karma, the supreme great teaching, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)儞哩(二合)怛曳(二合引)吽(引一句)爾時金剛最上明菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Om (citation needed) vajra-rāja (dichotomy) nyāri (dichotomy) tām (dichotomy) un (citation needed) at that point, the bodhisattva Mahāsa, the supreme luminosity of the Vajrasamādhi, spoke.
He spoke the great luminosity of his own karma-samādhi, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)尾禰踰(二合引)怛摩(一句)儞哩(二合)爹儞哩(二合)爹(二合)尾酤哩嚩(二合)尾酤哩嚩(二合)吽(引)癹吒(半音二)爾時金剛忿怒金剛火大明妃。
translation: "Om (citation) Vajrajirā (btn) Vairocana (btn) Tanyang (btn) Tamā (a phrase) Nīri (btn) Dad Nīri (btn) Dad (btn) Vairocana (btn) Vairocana (btn) Vairocana (btn) Un (citation) Neṭha (palindrome 2) At that point, the Vajra Indignant Vajra Fire Bodhisattva Mahāsattva was the great luminous consort.
She spoke the great luminosity of her own karma-samādhi, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)骨嚕(二合引)馱嚩日囉(二合引)屹儞(二合)入嚩(二合引)羅野(一句)底哩(二合)輸(引)覽(二)頻那紇哩(二合)捺煬嚩日哩(二合引)拏吽(引)癹吒(半音三)爾時金剛呬摩大明妃。
translation: "Om (citation) vajra (dichotomy) śrama (dichotomy) śrama (dichotomy) śinagara (dichotomy) (1) dirī (dichotomy) śo (citation) lang (2) vīṇa-ampari (dichotomy) gandharva (dichotomy) na un (citation) neṭṭa (semitone 3) At that point, the great luminous consort Vajragarbha was fretting.
She spoke the great luminosity of her own karma-samādhi, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)係(引)彌(引)親那作訖哩(二合引)拏(一句)嚩日哩(二合)尼吽(引)癹吒(半音二)爾時金剛驕摩哩大明妃。
translation: "Om (citation) vajrajirā (dichotomy) nyāna saṃkeri (dichotomy) apprehend (a phrase) vajrajirī (dichotomy) nyāna un (citation) kaṭṭha (semitone 2) at that time, the great luminous consort Vṛji Haṃmari.
She spoke the great luminosity of her own karma-samādhi, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)驕摩(引)哩(引一句)尸(引)竭囉(二合)摩(引)尾(引)舍野(二)健吒(引)攝沒儞(二合引)那嚩日囉(二合)播(引)尼必哩(二合)曳(引)(三)嚩日囉(二合)三摩野摩耨娑摩(二合)囉(四)囉拏囉拏吽(引)癹吒(半音五)爾時金剛寂靜大明妃。
translation: "Om (citation) Vajrarā (bis) Aumāra (citation) Nibili (citation) (i) Śrī (citation) Keghara (bis) Mo (citation) Oi (citation) Shesano (ii) Kanṭa (citation) Śubhūnī (bis) Nibili (citation) (iii) Vajrarā (bis) Samādhi (mahoraga) Māsama (bis) Rā (d) Rānalā Rānalā Un (citation) Neṭṭa (semitone 5) At that point, the great luminous consort Vajrajñālī was still.
She spoke the great luminosity of her own karma-samādhi, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)扇(引)底(一句)惹波惹播(引)叉摩(引)羅野(二)薩哩鑁(二合引)摩(引)囉野扇(引)多禰哩(二合)瑟吒野(三合)吽(引)癹吒(半音三)爾時金剛拳大明妃。
translation: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)扇(引)底(一句)惹波惹播(引)叉摩(引)羅野(二)薩哩鑁(二合引)摩(引)囉野扇(引)多禰哩(二合)瑟吒野(三合)吽(引)癹吒(半音三)爾時金剛拳大明妃。
She spoke the great luminosity of her own karma-samādhi, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)母瑟致(二合一句)喝那喝那嚩日哩(二合)拏(二)頻那頻那(三)閉(引)拏野閉(引)拏野(四)薩哩嚩(二合)訥瑟吒(二合)紇哩(二合)捺野(引)儞(五)唵(引)遜婆儞遜婆吽(引)癹吒(半音六)爾時金剛甘露忿怒王后。

She spoke the great luminosity of her own karma-samādhi, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合引)蜜哩(二合)帝(引一句)薩哩嚩(二合)訥瑟啗(二合引)屹哩(二合)恨拏(二合)(二)滿馱(三)喝那(四)波左尾馱鑁(二合)薩野(五)尾那(引)舍野(六)親那(七)頻那(八)跋悉彌(二合引)酤嚕母(引)哩馱(二合引)那(九)多(引)拏野嚩日哩(二合引)拏(十)曳(引)枳(引)訥[牟*含](二合)阿穆葛寫尾覲那(二合)尾那(引)野哥(引)(十一)娑擔(二合引)那(引)摩野(十二)禰(引)鉢多(二合)骨嚕(二合引)馱嚩日哩(二合)尼吽(引)癹吒(半音十三)爾時金剛光忿怒王后。
translation: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合引)蜜哩(二合)帝(引一句)薩哩嚩(二合)訥瑟啗(二合引)屹哩(二合)恨拏(二合)(二)滿馱(三)喝那(四)波左尾馱鑁(二合)薩野(五)尾那(引)舍野(六)親那(七)頻那(八)跋悉彌(二合引)酤嚕母(引)哩馱(二合引)那(九)多(引)拏野嚩日哩(二合引)拏(十)曳(引)枳(引)訥[牟*含](二合)阿穆葛寫尾覲那(二合)尾那(引)野哥(引)(十一)娑擔(二合引)那(引)摩野(十二)禰(引)鉢多(二合)骨嚕(二合引)馱嚩日哩(二合)尼吽(引)癹吒(半音十三)爾時金剛光忿怒王后。
She spoke the great luminosity of her own karma-samādhi, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)幹(引)底(一句)摩(引)囉野燥咩嚕(引)閉(引)(二)鉢囉(二合)禰(引)鉢多(二合引)耨囉(引)詣(引)拏(三)尸(引)竭囕(二合)塞怖(二合引)吒野紇哩(二合)捺煬(四)嚩日囉(二合)馱囉薩怛曳(二合引)那(五)摩賀(引)[口*爾]踰(二合引)嗟那(二合引)葛囉(引)羅(六)尸(引)多囉室彌(二合)嚩日哩(二合)尼吽(引)癹吒(半音七)爾時金剛勝杖忿怒王后。
translation: "Om (citation) vajra(er) gandharva(citation) ti (a phrase) mo(citation) rāno dhanglu(citation) (b) pra(er) 禰 (citation) pardo(er) hoe(citation) 詣(citation) na (citation) Śrī(citation) dakṣiṇu(er) za na (d) vajra(er) dhara sthātārā (e) mahā (citation) [kowl*er] yu(er) contemplating (er) gros (citation) la (f) Śrī(citation) tārā (er) vajra(citation) un(citation) za (semitone 7) It was then that the wrathful queen, the victorious staff of the Vajra, became furious.
She spoke the great luminosity of her own karma-samādhi, saying.

translation: "Om(citation needed) vajra(b) moṅgali(citation needed) gaṅgala(b) sāgala(b) sāgala(b) (2) Śikhāra(citation needed) sāgala(b) (3) pala(b) vai(citation needed) sāhas (4) pārājita(citation needed) rambakṣa(citation needed) (5) vajra(b) moṅgala dhāraṇī un(citation needed) ṭṭa(semitone 6) It was then that the Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva spoke these karmas of the Vajra group.

source_sentence: 說此一切金剛部羯磨曼拏羅頌曰。
translation: He spoke this verse of the karmic maṇḍala of all the vajras, saying.

source_sentence: 我今次第當演說　　最勝羯磨曼拏羅　依彼金剛壇法儀　　如應抨此曼拏羅　諸曼拏羅最初位　　於中先安其佛像　而彼左右行列間　　依法安布諸大士　中畫金剛最上明　　及彼明妃亦同畫　金剛嬉戲等祕密　　旋舞供養尊悉畫　彼中賢聖諸次第　　皆如輪壇法用作　自印對印及旋舞　　隨應次第如前畫　金剛香等四供養　　及彼金剛旋舞法　四隅并其四門間　　如前所說依法作此羯磨曼拏羅中。
translation: "Now, I will explain in order the most excellent karma maṇḍala based on the rituals of the vajra altar. This maṇḍala should be constructed according to the initial position of the maṇḍalas, in which the images of the buddhas are first placed, and the rows to the left and right of the maṇḍalas are arranged according to the teaching, in which the vajra's supreme luminosity and the luminaries of the buddhas are painted, and the vajra's playfulness and other secrets, revolving dance offerings, and other honored ones are all painted in the order of the good sages, according to the rituals of the wheel altar, their own signs, counter signs, and revolving dances, and the four offerings of vajra incense and other vajra revolving dances are painted in the same order as before, in the four corners and between the four entrances as explained above.
It contains all the karmic rituals such as the hooking and summoning rituals.
Once they're performed according to the teaching.
It's just as the teaching says.
"The vajra preceptor.
He should then make the karma-samādhi mudrā.
He then told his disciples.
"If there's anyone who doesn't see this part of the teaching.

source_sentence: 汝不應為說此羯磨祕密三昧。
translation: You shouldn't have taught this esoteric karma-samādhi for them.
It won't cause you to return to bring misfortune and blame.'
After he said this.

source_sentence: 金剛阿闍梨復結自羯磨金剛持三昧印。
translation: Vajra Ajari then again made the vajra-supporting samādhi seal of self-karma.
He looked angrily at them.
He spoke this great teaching, saying.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)馱(引)哩也(二合引)吠(引)舍野(一句)滿馱野(二)屹哩(二合)恨拏(二合引)波野(三)薩哩嚩(二合)葛哩摩(二合)悉亭鉢囉(二合)野蹉吽(引)惡(四)吽(引)阿(五)羅羅羅羅嚩日哩(二合)(六)然後依法引其弟子入曼拏羅。
translation: "Om (citation needed) vajra-rāja (dichotomy) dhāriya (dichotomy) vairocana (dichotomy) dhāraṇa (dichotomy) (2) eiri (dichotomy) hate na (dichotomy) pāna (3) sāriva (dichotomy) grima (dichotomy) setinpala (dichotomy) satsuma (dichotomy) un (citation needed) evil (4) un (citation needed) a (5) lalala lalala vajra (dichotomy) (6) Then, according to the teaching, he led his disciples into the maṇḍala.

source_sentence: 隨其所應即以印及對印。
translation: He then leads his disciple into the maṇḍala according to the rules, using the mudrā and counter mudrās as appropriate.
He makes marvelous revolving dance and makes offerings.
From then on.
He observes his body, speech, mind, and that which he observes.
All of his undertakings are accomplished.

source_sentence: 然後為其弟子除去面帛。
translation: Then, he removes his disciple's face and skin.

source_sentence: 即當教授旋舞作用印智。
translation: He then teaches the knowledge of the seal of the whirling dance's action.

source_sentence: 佛及執金剛等尊　　二羽和合勝三昧　金剛嬉戲等供養　　是即金剛最上明　彼一切明亦復然　　如其所說依次第　旋舞作用勝供養　　供養羯磨曼拏羅　金剛旋舞諸法用　　大印教授法亦然　二羽和合勝三昧　　對印現前得解脫　現前旋舞作用事　　供養一切大勝尊　所謂大執金剛等　　決定羯磨皆成就爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: The Buddha and the vajra-holder, the two-finned, combined, and superior samādhi, the vajra-playing, and so forth, make offerings. This is the vajra's supreme luminosity, and so are all of the other luminosities. As they're explained in order, the whirling dance serves as a superior offering, and the karma maṇḍala is offered, as does the great seal teaching method. The two-finned, combined, and superior samādhi, the manifestation of which leads to liberation, the manifestation of the whirling dance serves as an offering to all the great victorious venerables known as the great vajra-holders, etc., and the determined karma is accomplished.
"In order to cause all sentient beings.
They'll all be placed in the Vajra group.
That's why they're staying in the ground of nonretrogression.
He said to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 世尊我持一切如來祕密法。
translation: "Bhagavān, I've been upholding all the Tathāgata's esoteric teachings.
I've already been consecrated and received the Tathāgata's instructions.
But what about this secret?
It was then that the Bhagavān said.

source_sentence: 即入一切如來祕密金剛三摩地。
translation: He then entered the vajra-samādhi of the secrets of the Tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 說此一切如來祕密頌曰。
translation: He spoke this verse on the mysteries of the Tathāgatas, saying.

source_sentence: 隨應所有諸法儀　　皆從有情自性出　斯由為利有情故　　所作貪等皆清淨爾時金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "Accordingly, all the various ways of doing things arise from the self-nature of sentient beings. It's for the benefit of sentient beings that their cravings and so forth are purified.
He taught his own esoteric teaching.

source_sentence: 為利一切有情故　　以佛教法為正因　由是殺害諸有情　　此中無罪亦無染爾時金剛藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "For the benefit of all sentient beings, the Buddhist teaching is the proper cause. Because this is the reason for killing sentient beings, it's neither blameworthy nor defiled.
He taught his own precious and esoteric teachings.

source_sentence: 為利一切有情故　　即與佛身自和合　由是破壞於他心　　此中無罪亦無染爾時金剛眼菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: For the benefit of all sentient beings, that is, because it's inherently compatible with the Buddha's body and thus destroys the minds of others, this is neither blameworthy nor tainted.
He taught the esoteric Dharma of self-karma.

source_sentence: 貪性真樂無等比　　彼一切佛同所行　所欲隨行利有情　　如是行者得勝福爾時金剛巧業菩薩摩訶薩。
translation: "There's no comparison between the true enjoyment of the nature of desire and the way all buddhas practiced together and the way they want to follow the practice of it for the benefit of sentient beings. Such a practitioner will attain superior merit." It was then that the Vajrajñāna-eye Bodhisattva Mahāsa explained the secret Dharma of self-karma.
He taught the esoteric Dharma of self-karma.

source_sentence: 為利一切有情故　　以佛教法為正因　遍作一切事業成　　彼得廣多勝妙福爾時世尊大毘盧遮那如來。
translation: For the benefit of all sentient beings, using the Buddhist teachings as the proper cause, he accomplishes all his undertakings and brings about vast and numerous excellent merits. It was then that the Bhagavān, the Mahāvairocana Tathāgata, praised the Vajrapaṇi Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 為稱讚金剛手菩薩摩訶薩故。
translation: It was for the praise of Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva.
He spoke this verse, saying.

source_sentence: 金剛薩埵善哉者　　金剛大寶復善哉　善哉金剛妙法門　　善哉金剛勝羯磨　能善宣說此正法　　無上金剛祕密乘　一切如來祕密門　　大乘現證法中攝佛說一切如來真實攝大乘現證三昧大教王經卷第十七
translation: "Good, Vajrasattva! Good, Vajragarbha! Good, Vajragarbha's wonderful dharma-gate! Good, Vajragarbha's excellent karma-master who well explains this right teaching, the unsurpassed Vajragarbha's esoteric vehicle, all tathāgatas' esoteric gates, and the great vehicle's manifestly realized dharma in which the Buddha explains the true comprehension of all tathāgatas, the great vehicle's manifestly realized samādhi, the great king of teachings, vol. 17.
